questions.question: Climate change induced sea level rise is affecting oil & gas refineries because:

choices.answer: Storm surge helps to clean the refinery floors
The majority are near coastlines & are damaged by flooding
It's easier for personnel to get to oil rigs during floods

questions.question: Will there be a net increase in energy consumption from rising global temperatures in the U.S.?
Increases in sea level & extreme weather events will impact which transportation systems?
Reduced availability of water from climate change will impact this energy system the least:

choices.answer: Hydropower, which uses water to generate electricity
Nuclear, which uses water for cooling
Natural Gas, which uses water for fracking
Solar, which uses water in manufacturing
